summary:
The NBA is a popular basketball league in North America with 30 teams. It was formed in 1949 when two older leagues merged. Over time, it grew by adding teams from another league. The NBA season starts in October and ends in April, followed by playoff games.

NBA players are among the highest-paid athletes globally. The league is a member of USA Basketball and has offices in New York and New Jersey. The Boston Celtics have won the most NBA championships, with 18 titles.
title: National Basketball Association
